game.name: Racing Life
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Racing Life is a top-down racing game with an immersive career mode where you start with classic cars and progress to the most advanced open-wheel machines. Featuring multiple categories like Touring, GT, Prototypes, and Open-wheel, along with a variety of tracks worldwide.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Racing Life is a top-down racing game with an immersive career mode where you start with classic cars and progress to the most advanced open-wheel machines. Featuring multiple categories like Touring, GT, Prototypes, and Open-wheel, along with a variety of tracks worldwide.
